summary:
I've been helping getting MacStories setup on Bluesky this weekend and I came across a few handy sites.  There are loads of interesting Bluesky-related links in this awesome-bluesky list on GitHub, below is just the ones I happened upon and found useful. 
ClearSky allows you to see which lists (starter packs) you're in, who you've blocked and who's blocked you...
title: Useful Bluesky Tools

summary:
Okay, here’s a really deep, deep question of the day for a Monday:
Do you tip at coffee shops. 
The reason I ask.  Me and mine were at the mall yesterday and, for the first time in maybe over a year, the OH wanted a sugary Starbucks confection called: coffee...
title: Do you tip at coffee shops?
